name: run_service
description: Run a rust binary against a Kubernetes service using mirrord to mirror traffic; make an HTTP GET request to the /location endpoint, deserialize JSON into a Location { country: String, city: String } struct. Include the target Kubernetes deployment name and a valid mirrord configuration as a JSON string.

code.description: Complete Rust code using reqwest::blocking::get, serde::Deserialize, serde_json, and anyhow::Result to fetch and print country and city from the /location endpoint.

mirrord_config.description: JSON string for mirrord configuration, e.g., '{"feature": {"network": {"incoming": {"mode": "mirror", "ports": [ 8888 ] } } }'.
